title: What it's like to be a food writer when you can taste everything you see
excerpt: People with synesthesia experience stimulation in multiple senses: hearing color, feeling sounds—or tasting everything they see. For a food writer, that can lead to some fascinating revelations.

title: How Sugar Affects the Brain, According to a Neuroscience Expert
excerpt: Not surprisingly, you need sugar to function—but cravings are actually a result of too much.
